backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, product CRUD, updates, and contact submissions using maps and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature implementations, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file providing short predefined summaries for various frontend admin and page components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme file defining Beemedha color palette, fonts, dark mode tokens, and utility classes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure, pages, and admin-protected routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component that checks authentication and admin permissions, gating admin routes with alerts and login prompts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Reusable UI primitives for sections, containers, cards, badges, and buttons styled to match the brand theme.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a newsletter signup form with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the responsive site header with navigation links, admin access, mobile menu, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including a decorative background, header, routed content area, footer, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Displays a product update card with type badge, date, title, and preview text linking to the full news item.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Shows a product card with image, name, description, price, and availability badge linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Provides a disabled purchase button and alert indicating checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, stored identity handling, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns polling settings for live data refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates the document title and description meta tag based on the page's metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, product updates, and contact form submissions using the actor API.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the brand's story, values, and ethical beekeeping practices.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays the admin dashboard with navigation cards for managing products and news, plus an admin access notice.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Provides an interface to list, create, and delete product-related news updates with dialog-based forms.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Implements product management including listing, creating, editing, and deleting products via a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Displays certification, quality assurance, and lab testing information with supporting images and sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission via mutation, plus static contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and highlight cards promoting product qualities.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a single product update, including its date, message, type badge, and related product info.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows a tabbed list of product updates filtered by update type with sorting and last-updated info.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy with sections covering data collection, usage, sharing, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows full product details, images, availability, price, and related product updates with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a tabbed product catalog allowing filtering by category with real-time update timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page with static sections and headings using brand layout components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
